name: Planeto
description:
Planeto is a game I worked as a side project to start learning the basics of Unity. It is a planet view survival shooter game. Have fun and enjoy! 

Core Mechanics:

- Movement (W A S D)

- Shoot (Arrow Keys)

- You will take damage when enemies collide you

- Enemies will die and explode with force

- Enemies will spawn randomly in the game

- Health items are yellow boxes randomly spawn in the game

- Survive and gain the highest score 

Gameplay:

The player is in a planet that can run around and must survive from waves of enemies. Don't get too close to them as they can knock you away when they explode.

Android Version:

The Android version of the game is also available for download on Google Play!

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ZejGames.PlanetoSaga
